variable.name: gl_consolefont
variable.description: Changes your console font. Put all your charset images in qw/textures/charsets/*.png (and *.tga) and use /gl_loadcharset XXX to load XXX.png (or tga). "/gl_consolefont original" will restore the 8bit font in your gfx.wad (this is default). Note: Loadcharset is an alias for gl_consolefont.
